attributes.title: stinky 🙈
attributes.review: i was soooooooo excited to download this app and learn from our ✨orange✨ 🙈cheeto🙈 🤩president.🤩 but once i downloaded it i started feeling 🍊icky🍊 and heard 🙈voices🙈 telling me all these 🙊racist, sexist, and homophobic🙊 things 😭 really scary posters keep appearing in my room and all around my house. i would not recommend. it’s scary 😖
